articles.title: 50 Parting Thoughts From the 2025 French Open - Sports Illustrated
articles.summary: 50 Parting Thoughts From the 2025 French Open Coco Gauff ended a 10-year American championship drought at Roland Garros while Carlos Alcaraz charged to an epic title defense. Plus, Iga Świątek course-corrected, and Lois Boisson emerged as a local hero. Coco Gauff defeated Aryna Sabalenka to become the first American to win the French Open since Serena Williams in 2015.
